title: Fish chowder
ingredients: ['450g (1 lb) cod fillet', '225g (8 oz) smoked haddock', '1 fish stock cube', '450g (1 lb) potatoes, peeled and diced', '55g (2 oz) butter', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '600ml (1 pt) milk', '150ml (1/4 pt) double cream', '100g (4 oz) prawns, peeled', '1 lemon, juiced']
